tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V2.1.9 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: Big wave surfer Andrew Cotton rolls the dice on his season by choosing to explore a wave with huge potential. Big wave surfer Andrew Cotton risks his whole season on an unexplored piece of the Atlantic that could hold the biggest wave to ever be ridden. He travels to the middle of the ocean looking for the next big swell, but the ocean offers no guarantees.

programme.title: Moto 9
programme.sub-title: The world's best places for riding
programme.desc: Journey to the world's most incredible riding locations with riders who are worthy of such venues. Journey to the world's most incredible riding locations with riders who are worthy of such venues in Moto 9, the latest of the world's most progressive moto video franchise.

programme.title: Standing on Water
programme.desc: Casper Steinfath is a man with a goal to be the best stand up paddle surfer, despite being terrified of water. Casper Steinfath comes from a small, isolated fishing village in Denmark, and he is deathly afraid of water. He also wants to become one of the best stand up paddle surfers in the world. This is the story of what happens when passion overcomes fear.

programme.title: Hanging Spear
programme.desc: World class whitewater kayakers Steve Fisher and Pat Keller explore the Hanging Spear Gorge. Join world class whitewater kayakers Steve Fisher and Pat Keller as they explore the Hanging Spear Gorge of the Opalescent River, the highest source of the Hudson and the deepest part of New York State’s High Peaks wilderness.

programme.title: Pororoca
programme.desc: A group of surfers travel to a remote part of the Amazon in an attempt to ride a destructive tidal wave. On every new and full moon, an enormous tidal wave occurs along the lower Amazon. It's a tempting target for surfers despite the many dangers involved, and it offers few who brave it the longest continuous rides of their lives.

programme.title: Top action from New South Wales
programme.desc: Watch the wild adventures going down in New South Wales, for Red Bull Skate of Origin 2019. Watch the wild adventures going down in New South Wales, Australia, featuring Jake Hayes, Dane Burman, Rob Pace and more for Red Bull Skate of Origin 2019.

programme.title: Top action from Queensland
programme.desc: Watch the wild adventures going down in Queensland, Australia, for Red Bull Skate of Origin 2019. Watch the wild adventures going down in Queensland, Australia, featuring Jackson Pilz, Jake Duncombe, Jesse Noonan and more for Red Bull Skate of Origin 2019.

programme.title: Paying the Price
programme.sub-title: Taking on the world's toughest enduro race
programme.desc: Follow Toby Price’s emotional journey from simple country kid to Australia’s first Dakar Rally champion. Winning the Dakar Rally takes more than strength. Victory demands sacrifice, something Toby Price knows about firsthand. Follow Australia’s first Dakar Rally champion through the trials and tribulations that moulded him into the racer he is today.

programme.title: Lima, Peru
programme.desc: Peru's capital hosts the bombastic race that sends racers down a harrowing course in homemade vehicles. Fifty-three teams navigate their homemade racers down an obstacle-filled, 400m course in Lima, Peru. Creative chaos is the order of the day as these crazy contestants try to outdo one another in creativity, showmanship, and speed.

programme.title: AWOLNATION – Kill Your Heroes
programme.sub-title: Official music video from Red Bull Records
programme.desc: A group of kids are inspired to outrageous shenanigans by a group of bizarro-world Mister Rogers lookalikes. From their album Megalithic Symphony, AWOLNATION dresses up as a group of foul-mouthed, bizarro-world Mister Rogers lookalikes called The Milkmen and inspires a group of '60s children to rock-and-roll shenanigans.

programme.title: B-Boys on the Road
programme.desc: Break'n Reality S1E2. Roxrite attends a BC One All-Stars workshop and makes a big decision about his immediate future. Lilou travels from France to visit his extended family in Algeria. Neguin heads home to Brazil but still struggles with his brother's death last year.

programme.title: Viking Velocity
programme.desc: Downhill racer Erik Lundberg has a gravity-fuelled dream to break the world skateboard speed record. To break the current world speed record on a skateboard, downhill racer Erik Lundberg will have to go faster than 129.95kph (80.7mph). It's a feat that will make him rethink his motivations, his equipment and his commitment to his goal.

programme.title: Freerunning in India
programme.desc: Ryan visits India for the first time and has some fun learning a new skill — Bollywood dancing. Ryan visits India for the first time and has some fun learning a new skill — Bollywood dancing. After mingling with the locals and jumping from city rooftops, Ryan does some parkour in front of the breathtaking Taj Mahal.

programme.title: Kayaks, barrels and powder mountain
programme.desc: Jamie O’Brien and Poopies get up bright and early to go river surfing. Jamie O’Brien and Poopies get up bright and early to start river surfing. Then Poopies gets a serious dose of powder mountain before he and the crew go chasing barrels on kayaks.

programme.title: Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: Big wave surfer Andrew Cotton rolls the dice on his season by choosing to explore a wave with huge potential. Big wave surfer Andrew Cotton risks his whole season on an unexplored piece of the Atlantic that could hold the biggest wave to ever be ridden. He travels to the middle of the ocean looking for the next big swell, but the ocean offers no guarantees.

programme.title: Against the Odds
programme.sub-title: The gaming Cinderella story - EXCLUSIVE RELEASE ON AUGUST 7TH 3PM UTC
programme.desc: This is the journey of five Dota players and a coach, who, just two months before, had never played together. In 2018 Team OG were at rock-bottom, hit by painful departures and scrapping in qualifiers for Dota 2's T18. Against the Odds is the fairytale of this broken team's shot at Gaming’s biggest prize.

programme.title: Ground Effect
programme.desc: After 23 years away, Formula One returns to Mexico City’s legendary Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez track. A lot has changed since the last Mexican GP in 1992, and the track needs to be rebuilt to fulfill today’s FIA requirements. It's a race against time as millions of F1 fans worldwide are excited to see F1 Mexico come back to life.

programme.title: Silver Linings
programme.desc: Jessy Nelson, a lifelong rider, was rising to the top of his career when a crash left him paralysed. Jessy Nelson was a lifelong rider who was rising to the top of his career when a crash at the 2016 AMA Pro Motocross Championship left him paralysed. Today he's still a racer, just not on two wheels.

programme.title: The Sensei: Part I
programme.desc: Legendary climber Yuji Hirayama enlists a young partner to help him with a swan-song summit before retiring. Yuji Hirayama is one of the greats of modern climbing. Near retirement at 43, he enlists Daniel Woods, a young boulderer with loads of raw talent, to help him climb the unscaled peaks of Mount Kinabalu on the island of Borneo.

programme.title: Disco Demolition
programme.desc: A Chicago DJ unwittingly started a dance music revolution with one of radio's most infamous publicity stunts. In the peak of the 'Disco Sucks' phase of 1970s America, rock DJ Steve Dahl staged one of radio's most infamous publicity stunts: blowing up disco records at a Chicago White Sox game. It wound up being the first shot in a dance music revolution.
